get.description: Returns lesson info with activities. Activities don't include content.

put.summary: Update an existing lesson with an optional thumbnail file
put.description: Updates lesson fields. Uses multipart/form-data. One part named 'request' contains the JSON data. Another optional part named 'file' contains the new thumbnail image.

file.description: New thumbnail file for the lesson (optional)

get.summary: Get grade level details with paginated chapters
get.description: Returns grade level info with paginated chapters. Chapters don't include lessons. The 'isLastPage' field indicates if there are more chapters to load.

put.description: Updates grade level fields. If translations are updated, returns multi-language response with all updated translations.

get.summary: Get chapter details with paginated lessons
get.description: Returns chapter info with paginated lessons. Lessons don't include activities. The 'isLastPage' field indicates if there are more lessons to load.

put.summary: Update an existing chapter with an optional icon file
put.description: Updates chapter fields. Uses multipart/form-data. One part named 'request' contains the JSON data. Another optional part named 'file' contains the new icon image.

file.description: New icon file for the chapter (optional)

put.summary: Update an existing activity with an optional icon file
put.description: Updates activity fields. Uses multipart/form-data. One part named 'request' contains the JSON data. Another optional part named 'file' contains the new icon image.

file.description: New icon file for the activity (optional)

put.summary: Set/Update Sorting/Reorder content for an activity
put.description: Replaces the entire sorting content for the specified activity.

put.summary: Set/Update Quiz content for an activity
put.description: Replaces the entire quiz content for the specified activity.

put.summary: Set/Update Memory Game content for an activity
put.description: Replaces the entire memory game content for the specified activity.

put.summary: Set/Update Matching content for an activity
put.description: Replaces the entire matching content for the specified activity.

put.summary: Set/Update FillTheBlank content for an activity
put.description: Replaces the entire fill-the-blank content for the specified activity.

post.summary: Create a new lesson with an optional thumbnail file
post.description: Creates a new lesson. Uses multipart/form-data. One part named 'request' contains the JSON data. Another optional part named 'file' contains the thumbnail image.

get.summary: Get all active grade levels with pagination
get.description: Returns a simplified paginated list of grade levels. Response contains only 'content' array and 'isLastPage' boolean. Parameters (page, size, sort) are not echoed back in response.

post.description: Creates a new grade level. Returns grade level info with all created language translations, with createdAt but without updatedAt timestamp.

post.summary: Create a new chapter with an optional icon file
post.description: Creates a new chapter. Uses multipart/form-data. One part named 'request' contains the JSON data. Another optional part named 'file' contains the icon image.

post.summary: Create a new activity with an optional icon file
post.description: Creates a new activity. Uses multipart/form-data. One part named 'request' contains the JSON data. Another optional part named 'file' contains the icon image.
